title: The Enthusiastic Yes vs. The Polite Yes

segments.speaker: Friend A
segments.text: Hey, want to come to my birthday party next Saturday?

segments.speaker: Friend B - Enthusiastic
segments.text: Oh my gosh, yes! I wouldn't miss it. What time should I be there? Can I bring anything?

segments.speaker: Narrator
segments.text: Now listen to the same question with a different response.

segments.speaker: Friend A
segments.text: Hey, want to come to my birthday party next Saturday?

segments.speaker: Friend B - Polite
segments.text: Oh, um, yeah sure, I'll try to make it. What time is it?

segments.speaker: Narrator
segments.text: Notice the difference? Let's break it down.
